projects.title: WeatherVue
description: A weather application that provides weather conditions for the current location and allows users to search for weather conditions at other places.
Utilized Geolocation API to obtain user location permission for retrieving current weather conditions.
Implemented the AsyncPaginate component from react-select-async-paginate for designing the search functionality.

projects.title: Xcripto
description: Created a crypto currency application that provides real-time data for stock exchanges and coins.
Implemented 24 hour forecast for coins with different time-duration forecasts.
Linked stock exchanges to their respective official websites for trading purposes.

projects.title: Shopping Cart
description: Developed a shopping cart using useReducer () hook and Context API for state management as an alternative to Redux.
Implemented functionalities like adding and removing products, filtering products based on user specific criteria, etc.
Suitable for integration into an E-commerce website to efficiently manage the cart section.

projects.title: GymMaster
description: Workout Demos: New to a specific exercise? FitHub provides step-by-step video tutorials and detailed instructions, making sure you execute each movement correctly and effectively.

Virtual Personal Trainer: Can't make it to the gym? No problem! Our app features a virtual personal trainer who guides you through workouts with step-by-step instructions and motivation, replicating the in-person experience from the comfort of your own space.
